Package org.mitre.synthea.export.rif

Class ConsolidatedClaimLines

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.world.concepts.Claim.ClaimCost
      • org.mitre.synthea.export.rif.ConsolidatedClaimLines
  • public class ConsolidatedClaimLines
extends Claim.ClaimCost
    Utility class for consolidating multiple claim lines of the same type for the same clinician.

    • Method Detail

      • addClaimLine

        public void addClaimLine​(java.lang.String hcpcsCode,
                         java.lang.String revCntr,
                         Claim.ClaimCost cost,
                         HealthRecord.Encounter encounter)
        Add a claim to the set of consolidated claim lines. Creates a new claim line if the clinician, hcpcsCode or revCntr are different for any existing consolidated claim lines.
        Parameters:
        hcpcsCode - HCPCS code
        revCntr - revenue center
        cost - claim costs
        encounter - the encounter which is used to obtain the clinician

      • getLines

        public java.util.Collection<ConsolidatedClaimLines.ConsolidatedClaimLine> getLines()
